name: Seibu Cup Soccer
overview:
Seibu Cup Soccer is an arcade soccer game created by Seibu Kaihatsu that includes eight international teams: England, Germany, U.S.A., Japan, Italy, Brazil, Argentina and Korea.

After picking a team, you must make it through eight rounds with each match lasting 90 seconds. If a match ends in a draw, you can continue and choose between either extra time or penalty kicks. During the match, the dynamite kick gauge will randomly appear and when it is full it allows you to perform a more powerful kick. The game also supports up to 4 players simultaneously.
